properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Come and behold Him The One and the Only Cry out, sing holy Forever a Holy God Come and worship the Holy God{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Who else commands all the hosts of heaven? Who else could make every king bow down? Who else can whisper and darkness trembles? Only a Holy God{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}What other beauty demands such praise? What other splendor outshines the sun? What other majesty rules with justice? Only a Holy God{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}What other glory consumes like fire? What other power can raise the dead? What other name remains undefeated? Only a Holy God{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Who else could rescue me from my failing? Who else would offer His only Son? Who else invites me to call Him Father? Only a Holy God Only our Holy God{/lang-eng}
